name: Apocalypse Survival Royale
description:
The advent of modern world war has brought about the end of the world. Let the shooting madness unleash and strive for battlegrounds survival as a layer unknown. This grand battle makes it seem like its your last day on planet earth. The battle royal is as deadly and dangerous as it could get. You have to be the lone survivor rifleman in the war action battlefield. Get on your mucks, prepare for the most challenging shooting competition, become the modern sniper in this fierce shooter battle, dig out enemies from their hideout spaces let the sniper shooter game begin. The royal battle arena challenges the gunman in you, in this best of sniper shooter games 2018, sustain the rival attack and encounter zombie waves in the war action scenario. Play amongst the choice of high end battle equipment in the war zone, avail from a selection of rifles, snipers and shotgun bazooka to attack the enemy

Game Features:
• Realistic Controls And Movements
• Maps To Guide You In The 3D Environment
• Wonderful 3D Graphics Of The Zombie Apocalypse
• Get To Choose From A Wide Variety Of Battle Equipment
• Snipers, Rifles, Shotgun Bazooka Along With A Bow And Arrow.
• The Sudden Zombie Attack In Battle Arena.
• 3 Modes Of Gameplay In The Field Of Battle.
• A Modern War That Brings You To The End Of The World.
• Brilliant War Zone Action
